item.title: Differences among Gadwal Congress leaders flare up again
item.description:
<![CDATA[Differences among Gadwal Congress leaders flare up again
Following the Assembly elections, Gadwal MLA Krishnamohan Reddy switched allegiance from the BRS to the Congress. Since then, tensions have been high between his supporters and those of Saritha Tirupataiah, who had contested the elections on a Congress ticket.
By Telangana Today Published Date - 19 April 2025, 02:17 PM
Jogulamba Gadwal: Differences among Congress leaders in the district flared up again and this time, it was at the Bhu B...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
